11-11.title: SELF-ACCEPTANCE
11-11.quote: We know that God lovingly watches over us. We know that when we turn to Him, all will be well with us, here and hereafter.
11-11.source: TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 105
content: I pray for the willingness to remember that I am a child of God, a divine soul in human form, and that my most basic and urgent life-task is to accept, know, love and nurture myself. As I accept myself, I am accepting God's will. As I know and love myself, I am knowing and loving God. As I nurture myself I am acting on God's guidance.
I pray for the willingness to let go of my arrogant self-criticism, and to praise God by humbly accepting and caring for myself.
